mapper.select:
SELECT COLLECT_DATE AS collectDate, USER_CD AS userCode, USER_NM AS userName, LOCALE AS locale FROM bis_ht_login
WHERE COLLECT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
INSERT INTO bis_ht_login ( COLLECT_DATE, USER_CD, USER_NM, LOCALE ) VALUES ( #{collectDate}, #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{locale} )
